Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Research and Development Manager to lead our research and laboratory operations. Reporting to the executive team, you will play a crucial role in advancing our PCE technology and maintaining our position as the leader in the market in Saudi Arabia.Key Responsibilities:Market Knowledge: Possess a comprehensive understanding of superplasticizers available in the market, along with the latest industry trends and technologies.
Quality Control: Apply expertise in quality control within chemical manufacturing to maintain high product standards.
Research and Development Leadership: Lead the R&D team in the development and design of experiments, ensuring that research projects are effectively implemented.
Test Protocol Adherence: Ensure that all tests and experiments adhere to test protocols and company procedures.
Data Management: Oversee the accurate recording, verification, and reporting of experiment data and observations.
Laboratory Operations: Lead laboratory operations, including chemical analysis, chemical synthesis, raw material quality assurance, product quality control, concrete trials, and R&D activities.
Innovation: Drive innovation and creative thinking within the R&D team to continually improve our PCE product.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Chemistry or a related field (Master's or Ph.D. preferred).
Substantial experience in chemical research and development, with a focus on concrete admixtures (superplasticizers).
In-depth knowledge of industry norms, the latest technologies, and quality control practices.
Strong leadership skills and a proven track record in leading R&D teams.
Exceptional problem-solving and creative thinking abilities.
Detail-oriented with excellent data management skills.
Fluency in English is a preferable requirement.

TriStar Technical Co. is the pioneering and exclusive producer of PolyCarboxylate Ether (PCE), an advanced superplasticizer in concrete technology, in Saudi Arabia. As industry leaders, we are committed to innovation, quality, and sustainable business practices.
